description: Front Porch, single and two storey side to rear extension; single storey rear extension; external alterations (demolition of detached garage)
decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the side elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

The flat roof area of the single storey rear extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Location/Block Plan received 23-11-2023;Proposed Ground Floor Plan entitled Drawing No: Page 3/10 Rev 1;Proposed First Floor Plan entitled Drawing No: Page 4/10 Rev 1;Proposed Roof Plan entitled Drawing No: Page 5/10 Rev 1;Proposed Elevations Plan entitled Drawing No: Page 7/10 Rev 1;

The development hereby permitted shall be begun
before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
